translations.translation: He says: "I have wasted a great deal of wealth."
He says: “I have squandered enormous wealth.”
(He boasts and shows off) saying, "I have spent a great deal of money (for the cause of God)".
He says: "I have wasted wealth in abundance!"
He shall say: I have wasted much wealth.
And he saith: I have destroyed vast wealth:
He says, "I have spent enormous wealth."
He saith: 'I have wasted riches plenteous.
He says, ‘I have squandered immense wealth.’
He may say (boastfully); Wealth have I squandered in abundance!
He says (boastfully): "I have wasted wealth in abundance!"
He will say: 'I have destroyed a vast wealth'
He says, “I have used up so much money.”
He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."
[90:6] He says, ‘I have exhausted, in enmity of Muhammad (s), vast wealth!’, great [wealth], piles and piles of it.

(And he) Kildah Ibn Usayd; and it is also said: al-Walid Ibn al-Mughirah (saith: I have destroyed vast wealth) I have spent abundant wealth in enmity towards Muhammad, Allah bless him, and this did not benefit me:

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالاً لُّبَداً } أي كثيراً

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ومن كمال بطره وغروره ومفاخرته على بني نوعه { يَقُولُ } على سبيل الخيلاء والسمعة والرياء: { أَهْلَكْتُ } وأنفقت في سبيل الله { مَالاً لُّبَداً } [البلد: 6] مالاً كثيراً ملبَّداً منضداً مجتمعاً متراكماً

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { يقولُ أهلكتُ مالاً لُّبَداً } أي: كثيراً، جمع لُبْدَة وهو ما تلبّد بعضه على بعض، يريد كثرة ما أنفقه، مما كان أهل الجاهلية يسمونها مكارم ومعالي، رياءً وفخراً
